com.here.android.mpa.customlocation

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.customlocation.Request
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AreaGeometryRequest, AreaRequest, AttributeRequest, CorridorRequest, IdGeometryRequest, PointGeometryRequest, ProximityRequest

    public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a custom location search request for retrieving user-defined locations or custom geometries.

    These are the types of request available:

    • Proximity - search for user-defined locations around a specified point.
    • Area - search for user-defined locations within a specified bounding box.
    • Corridor - search for all user-defined locations within a distance along an isoline route.
    • Attribute - search for all user-defined locations that match query parameters for standard or custom attributes.

    A new Request should be created for each search.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Request.Error
      Represents values describing possible search request errors.
      static interface  Request.ResultListener
      Represents a listener that reports information about the completion of a custom location search Request.

      Specifies the filters on any user-defined custom attribute associated with locations in a layer.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public Request.Error execute(Request.ResultListener listener)
        Executes the asynchronous custom location request
        Parameters:
        listener - A Request.ResultListener to be notified when the search request is completed.
        Returns:
        Request.Error.NONE if request is sent successfully, otherwise, one of the other Error values.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if listener is {code null}.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancels a search request in progress. Otherwise, nothing happens.

      • setCustomAttributeQuery

        public void setCustomAttributeQuery(CustomQueryBuilder query)
        Specifies the filters on any user-defined custom attribute associated with locations in a layer.
        Parameters:
        query - A CustomQueryBuilder specifying the search filter of a list of user-defined attributes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if query specifies no filter.
        See Also:
        QueryBuilder

      • setQuery

        public void setQuery(QueryBuilder query)
        Specifies the filter(s) to be used for a custom location request result on pre-defined attributes.
        Parameters:
        query - A QueryBuilder specifying the search filter of a list of pre-defined attributes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if query specifies no filter.
        See Also:
        QueryBuilder, QueryBuilder.Attribute

      • setLimit

        public void setLimit(int limit)
        Specifies the maximum amount of locations to return.
        Parameters:
        limit - An int specifies the maximum locations that can be returned in a request.
